Type: Mne production, grosss weight, marketable chromite ore
Prod_note: Units are thousand metric tons, gross weight, of marketable chromite ore.
Reserves_notes: Units are thousand metric tons of shipping-grade chromite ore, which is deposit quantity and grade normalized to 45% Cr2O3, except for the United States, where grade is normalized to 7% Cr2O3, and Finland, where grade is normalized to 26% Cr2O3.
